bettergrass.midnightconfig.title: FabricBetterGrass
bettergrass.midnightconfig.betterGrassMo:
§4Off §r- Grass Blocks look normal
§3Fast §r- Top Grass texture will be applied to all sides of the Grass Blocks (fast)
§dFancy §r- Top Grass texture will be applied dynamically to required sides of the Grass Blocks (slow)

§cWorld reload or F3+A is required to apply changes.
bettergrass.midnightconfig.blockstates.t: Grass-like blocks that should be connected on slopes.
